# SDK Generation References

Reference material used by `sdk-gen`.

## Files

- `openapi-generator-config.md` - Generator flags and rationale
- `tapis-api-specs.md` - TAPIS spec source notes
- `OpenAPI_specs.json` - Environment/service to spec URL mapping
- `common-issues.md` - Known generation failures and fixes
- `best-practices.md` - Repeatable workflow guidance
